statements: SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers
SELECT customer_id, first_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT customer_id, first_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_since >= '2020-01-01' ORDER BY customer_since DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT * FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' AND email NOT LIKE '%yahoo.com';
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01' AND end_date <= '2023-06-30' ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience, budget FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 AND budget < 10000 ORDER BY campaign_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE total_budget > 1000;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_price FROM Orders WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE total_price >= 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, total_budget FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND end_date <= '2021-12-31';

SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_address FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, total_budget FROM Campaigns ORDER BY total_budget DESC, start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, price FROM purchases WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '(555)%';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, email, COUNT(*) AS purchase_count FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id, email;

SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, COUNT(*) AS total_results FROM campaigns JOIN campaign_results ON campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_results.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name, start_date, end_date ORDER BY total_results DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) as order_count FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
